article.title: Bungie Extends Marathon Closed Alpha Test, Major Faction Changes and AI Buffs Incoming - The Game Post
article.description: Bungie has extended the Marathon Closed Alpha test until May 6, unlocking all Faction upgrades, increased AI challenges, and stress testing.

tweet_text:
Marathon Alpha extended to May 6!  Bungie's unlocking all Faction upgrades & buffing the AI for some serious stress testing. Think you can handle the tougher bots?  #Marathon #AI  Read more

https://thegamepost.com/bungie-extends-marathon-closed-alpha-test/
